list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: belonging to or associated with which person.
of whom or which (used to indicate that the following noun belongs to or is associated with the person or thing mentioned in the previous clause).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he's a man whose opinion I respect
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy là một người đàn ông có ý kiến tôi tôn trọng
